subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Four years ago, St. John’s brought in a group of recruits that seemingly had the potential to return the program to the top tier, but now those seniors are still looking for their first N.C.A.A. tournament berth.
snippet: Four years ago, St. John’s brought in a group of recruits that seemingly had the potential to return the program to the top tier, but now those seniors are still looking for their first N.C.A.A. tournament berth.
